basics.name: Girish Kulathumani
basics.summary: Computer Science student at VIT Chennai with expertise in high-performance computing and artificial intelligence. Focused on the intersection of computational efficiency, security systems, and AI with particular emphasis on GPU acceleration and parallelized architectures.

work.summary: Conducted research in cybersecurity, secure messaging architecture, and computational applications
highlights: Advancing Cybersecurity through Deception and Adaptive Analysis: Collaborated on novel cybersecurity measures, conducted literature reviews, designed experiments, analyzed data using Python, TensorFlow, and PyTorch, and contributed to a research paper (preprint stage).

Modular Parallelised Secure Messaging Architecture: Led team in developing a secure messaging pipeline, implemented encryption algorithms using CUDA, evaluated performance and security, and documented results.
Additional Research: Working on five papers covering High Performance Computing, Computational Neuroscience, Deep learning applications, and financial data analysis.

work.summary: Developed data analysis skills and implemented a weapon detection system
highlights: YOLO Weapon Detection Project: Led the development of a highly accurate YOLO model for detecting weapons from webcam video footage, enhancing safety. Deployed the model using Flask for web application.
Technical Proficiency: Mastered advanced data analysis and visualization techniques using NumPy, pandas, Matplotlib, Seaborn, and TensorFlow.
Collaborative Teamwork: Worked effectively with a team of three on project design, implementation, and presentation.

work.summary: Created philosophical content for academic audience
highlights: Research and Writing: Authored long-term (10-12 minute reads), medium-term (5-7 minute reads), and short-term (3-4 minute reads) blogs on various philosophy topics.
Content Creation: Produced in-depth, well-researched content, enhancing the club's online presence and engaging the academic community.
Communication Skills: Developed clear and concise writing, making complex philosophical concepts accessible.

work.position: Social Media Manager and Event Coordinator
work.summary: Managed social media presence for the Startup Incubation Centre
highlights: Strategically managed social media platforms, increasing engagement and visibility for the Startup Incubation Centre.

projects.name: High Performance(CUDA+Parallel) Real-time Sentiment Analysis for Stock Trading
projects.description: GPU-accelerated system that processes financial news and social media in real-time, extracting market sentiment signals for trading decisions.
highlights: Reduced the time taken for sentiment analysis on multiple news articles dynamically from 8 minutes to 10 seconds for any stock.
Enabled real-time analysis of financial news and social media data to identify market sentiment and support informed trading decisions.

projects.name: LSTM-Based Predictive Modeling for Mutual Fund NAV Forecasting
projects.description: Deep learning system that forecasts mutual fund Net Asset Values using recurrent neural networks trained on comprehensive market datasets.
highlights: Developed and implemented a robust LSTM model for predicting Net Asset Values (NAVs) of mutual funds based on historical market data.
Leveraged LSTM architecture to capture temporal dependencies and patterns in financial data, enabling accurate forecasts of NAVs.

projects.name: JIGSaw - A Novel Modular Parallelised Secure Messaging Architecture
projects.description: Performance-optimized cryptographic communication framework leveraging parallelized execution paths and advanced cipher implementations.
highlights: Designed and implemented a parallelized high-performance cryptographic communication system in Python.
Contributed to the reduction of processing time for cryptographic operations pipeline from 6 minutes to 17 seconds.

projects.name: Online Bank interface with Python, Tkinter, and MySQL
projects.description: A transactional platform for simulated banking operations with real-time data synchronization and comprehensive security features.
highlights: Developed an interactive GUI for a simulated online bank using Python and Tkinter, integrating MySQL for backend database management.
Implemented key functionalities such as fund deposit/withdrawal, new account creation, loan management with interest rates, and credit card application.
Implemented real-time data synchronization using MySQL connectors, enabling dynamic adjustment of rates based on actual dates and times.

projects.name: YOLO Weapon Detection Project
projects.description: A computer vision system for detecting weapons in real-time video footage to enhance safety and security.
highlights: Led the development of a highly accurate YOLO model for detecting weapons from webcam video footage.
Deployed the model using Flask to create a functional web application to alert authorities.

publications.summary: Research on novel cybersecurity measures using deception techniques and adaptive analysis.

publications.name: JIGSaw: A Novel Modular Parallel Encryption and Authentication Pipeline for Secure Messaging
publications.summary: A framework for high-performance cryptographic communication with parallelized execution paths.

certifications.name: Google Career Certificates: Advanced Data Analytics

leadership.description: Delivered an engaging seminar on the workings and applications of CUDA to an audience of over 50 students.

focus.description: Developing specialized acceleration techniques for computationally intensive workloads using CUDA and distributed processing frameworks.
focus.currentWork: Real-time financial sentiment analysis engine leveraging RAPIDS and distributed Apache Spark clusters.

focus.description: Engineering next-generation cryptographic frameworks with a focus on performance-optimized encryption and authentication.
focus.currentWork: Modular cryptographic pipeline with parallelized execution paths and advanced security primitives.

focus.description: Exploring the computational foundations of neuroscience through the GreyLattice research initiative.
focus.currentWork: Brain decoding and visual perception reconstruction techniques.

initiatives.name: GreyLattice
initiatives.description: A research initiative focused on computational neuroscience and human-machine interfaces.
